description.narrative: Contribute to achieving SDG7 - that is affordable, reliable, sustainable, and modern energy solutions for all by 2030, ensuring a just and inclusive energy transition—in line with the Paris Agreement—that leaves no one behind.

Denmark’s funding to SEforALL is earmarked to the support of energy transition in ODA eligible countries through 1) The Energy Efficiency for Sustainable Development programme to support collaboration between SEforALL, the partners of the Three Percent Club and the NDC Partnership to accelerate energy efficiency in Kenya and Ghana and integrate energy efficiency into the NDCs and 2) increase ambition on energy transition and climate change via support for the SRSG’s role in high level SG7 and climate diplomacy through secondment of a professional staff member to SEforALL in New York from March 2022-December 2023.
Results can be found in the annual reports here: https://www.seforall.org/who-we-are/official-documents?publication_subtypes%5b19%5d=19&sort_bef_combine=unified_date_DESC
